channel.title: [WIP] OSRS text-based been working on for weeks!
channel.description:
Okay so I have been working on this development for a couple of weeks and I think that there are very few bugs now, (none that i'm aware of however) so I think it is ready to be released to the public. [b]Some key features include:[/b]
Working Chat box - from scratch. With AJAX functionality (added today) News Feed Registration is simple AdminCP - started
[b]Things which are going to be added[/b]
The game (obviously) i've been focusing on the chat box and homepage Highscores (will come out in the Beta of the game) a "Grand Market" like the grand exchange (to show prices not to sell, players will be able to trade other players) More will be posted on the website.
[b]Website Link:[/b] [url=http://osrs.x10.mx/]http://osrs.x10.mx/[/url] Feedback is welcomed

item.title: [WIP] OSRS text-based been working on for weeks!
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

From the images on your forums it’s looking pretty neat so far, I’m assuming your using mysql, php and javascript?

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] OSRS text-based been working on for weeks!
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:3, topic:541349”][quote author=The Web Guy link=topic=660220.msg4415558#msg4415558 date=1395759638]
If you have been working on it for weeks and only have this (little) amount of progress, that’s not much.
[/quote]Not everyone is The Web Guy.[/quote]

I may have spoken too soon actually, after looking more into the forums there is a little more information and images with where the game stands, good luck with the development Marc.

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] OSRS text-based been working on for weeks!
item.dc:creator: @marc_osrs marc_osrs
item.description:
@marc_osrs wrote:

Okay so I have been working on this development for a couple of weeks and I think that there are very few bugs now, (none that i’m aware of however) so I think it is ready to be released to the public.

Some key features include:

Working Chat box - from scratch. With AJAX functionality (added today) News Feed Registration is simple AdminCP - started

Things which are going to be added

The game (obviously) i've been focusing on the chat box and homepage Highscores (will come out in the Beta of the game) a "Grand Market" like the grand exchange (to show prices not to sell, players will be able to trade other players) More will be posted on the website.

Website Link: http://osrs.x10.mx/

Feedback is welcomed

Read full topic
